Title: Requires provision be made for pregnancy termination procedures in every hospital, surgical or medical policy offering maternity care coverage
Summary: Requires that provision be made for pregnancy termination procedures insurance coverage in every individual or group hospital, surgical or medical policy, or hospital service or medical expense indemnity contract of a service corporation, only where any such policy or contract offers maternity care coverage.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring that provision be made for pregnancy termination procedures in every individual or group policy or contract which provides coverage or indemnity for hospital, surgical or medical care and which offers maternity care coverage
